name: Saheeh International
text: Sad. By the Qur'an containing reminder...

name: Saheeh International
text: But those who disbelieve are in pride and dissension.

name: Saheeh International
text: How many a generation have We destroyed before them, and they [then] called out; but it was not a time for escape.

name: Saheeh International
text: And they wonder that there has come to them a warner from among themselves. And the disbelievers say, "This is a magician and a liar.

name: Saheeh International
text: Has he made the gods [only] one God? Indeed, this is a curious thing."

name: Saheeh International
text: And the eminent among them went forth, [saying], "Continue, and be patient over [the defense of] your gods. Indeed, this is a thing intended.

name: Saheeh International
text: We have not heard of this in the latest religion. This is not but a fabrication.

name: Saheeh International
text: Has the message been revealed to him out of [all of] us?" Rather, they are in doubt about My message. Rather, they have not yet tasted My punishment.

name: Saheeh International
text: Or do they have the depositories of the mercy of your Lord, the Exalted in Might, the Bestower?

name: Saheeh International
text: Or is theirs the dominion of the heavens and the earth and what is between them? Then let them ascend through [any] ways of access.

name: Saheeh International
text: [They are but] soldiers [who will be] defeated there among the companies [of disbelievers].

name: Saheeh International
text: The people of Noah denied before them, and [the tribe of] 'Aad and Pharaoh, the owner of stakes,

name: Saheeh International
text: And [the tribe of] Thamud and the people of Lot and the companions of the thicket. Those are the companies.

name: Saheeh International
text: Each of them denied the messengers, so My penalty was justified.

name: Saheeh International
text: And these [disbelievers] await not but one blast [of the Horn]; for it there will be no delay.

name: Saheeh International
text: And they say, "Our Lord, hasten for us our share [of the punishment] before the Day of Account"

name: Saheeh International
text: Be patient over what they say and remember Our servant, David, the possessor of strength; indeed, he was one who repeatedly turned back [to Allah].

name: Saheeh International
text: Indeed, We subjected the mountains [to praise] with him, exalting [Allah] in the [late] afternoon and [after] sunrise.

name: Saheeh International
text: And the birds were assembled, all with him repeating [praises].

name: Saheeh International
text: And We strengthened his kingdom and gave him wisdom and discernment in speech.

name: Saheeh International
text: And has there come to you the news of the adversaries, when they climbed over the wall of [his] prayer chamber -

name: Saheeh International
text: When they entered upon David and he was alarmed by them? They said, "Fear not. [We are] two adversaries, one of whom has wronged the other, so judge between us with truth and do not exceed [it] and guide us to the sound path.

name: Saheeh International
text: Indeed this, my brother, has ninety-nine ewes, and I have one ewe; so he said, 'Entrust her to me,' and he overpowered me in speech."

name: Saheeh International
text: [David] said, "He has certainly wronged you in demanding your ewe [in addition] to his ewes. And indeed, many associates oppress one another, except for those who believe and do righteous deeds - and few are they." And David became certain that We had tried him, and he asked forgiveness of his Lord and fell down bowing [in prostration] and turned in repentance [to Allah].

name: Saheeh International
text: So We forgave him that; and indeed, for him is nearness to Us and a good place of return.

name: Saheeh International
text: [We said], "O David, indeed We have made you a successor upon the earth, so judge between the people in truth and do not follow [your own] desire, as it will lead you astray from the way of Allah." Indeed, those who go astray from the way of Allah will have a severe punishment for having forgotten the Day of Account.

name: Saheeh International
text: And We did not create the heaven and the earth and that between them aimlessly. That is the assumption of those who disbelieve, so woe to those who disbelieve from the Fire.

name: Saheeh International
text: Or should we treat those who believe and do righteous deeds like corrupters in the land? Or should We treat those who fear Allah like the wicked?

name: Saheeh International
text: [This is] a blessed Book which We have revealed to you, [O Muhammad], that they might reflect upon its verses and that those of understanding would be reminded.

name: Saheeh International
text: And to David We gave Solomon. An excellent servant, indeed he was one repeatedly turning back [to Allah].

name: Saheeh International
text: [Mention] when there were exhibited before him in the afternoon the poised [standing] racehorses.

name: Saheeh International
text: And he said, "Indeed, I gave preference to the love of good [things] over the remembrance of my Lord until the sun disappeared into the curtain [of darkness]."

name: Saheeh International
text: [He said], "Return them to me," and set about striking [their] legs and necks.

name: Saheeh International
text: And We certainly tried Solomon and placed on his throne a body; then he returned.

name: Saheeh International
text: He said, "My Lord, forgive me and grant me a kingdom such as will not belong to anyone after me. Indeed, You are the Bestower."

name: Saheeh International
text: So We subjected to him the wind blowing by his command, gently, wherever he directed,

name: Saheeh International
text: And [also] the devils [of jinn] - every builder and diver

name: Saheeh International
text: And others bound together in shackles.

name: Saheeh International
text: [We said], "This is Our gift, so grant or withhold without account."

name: Saheeh International
text: And indeed, for him is nearness to Us and a good place of return.

name: Saheeh International
text: And remember Our servant Job, when he called to his Lord, "Indeed, Satan has touched me with hardship and torment."

name: Saheeh International
text: [So he was told], "Strike [the ground] with your foot; this is a [spring for] a cool bath and drink."

name: Saheeh International
text: And We granted him his family and a like [number] with them as mercy from Us and a reminder for those of understanding.

name: Saheeh International
text: [We said], "And take in your hand a bunch [of grass] and strike with it and do not break your oath." Indeed, We found him patient, an excellent servant. Indeed, he was one repeatedly turning back [to Allah].

name: Saheeh International
text: And remember Our servants, Abraham, Isaac and Jacob - those of strength and [religious] vision.

name: Saheeh International
text: Indeed, We chose them for an exclusive quality: remembrance of the home [of the Hereafter].

name: Saheeh International
text: And indeed they are, to Us, among the chosen and outstanding.

name: Saheeh International
text: And remember Ishmael, Elisha and Dhul-Kifl, and all are among the outstanding.

name: Saheeh International
text: This is a reminder. And indeed, for the righteous is a good place of return

name: Saheeh International
text: Gardens of perpetual residence, whose doors will be opened to them.

name: Saheeh International
text: Reclining within them, they will call therein for abundant fruit and drink.

name: Saheeh International
text: And with them will be women limiting [their] glances and of equal age.

name: Saheeh International
text: This is what you, [the righteous], are promised for the Day of Account.

name: Saheeh International
text: Indeed, this is Our provision; for it there is no depletion.

name: Saheeh International
text: This [is so]. But indeed, for the transgressors is an evil place of return -

name: Saheeh International
text: Hell, which they will [enter to] burn, and wretched is the resting place.

name: Saheeh International
text: This - so let them taste it - is scalding water and [foul] purulence.

name: Saheeh International
text: And other [punishments] of its type [in various] kinds.

name: Saheeh International
text: [Its inhabitants will say], "This is a company bursting in with you. No welcome for them. Indeed, they will burn in the Fire."

name: Saheeh International
text: They will say, "Nor you! No welcome for you. You, [our leaders], brought this upon us, and wretched is the settlement."

name: Saheeh International
text: They will say, "Our Lord, whoever brought this upon us - increase for him double punishment in the Fire."

name: Saheeh International
text: And they will say, "Why do we not see men whom we used to count among the worst?

name: Saheeh International
text: Is it [because] we took them in ridicule, or has [our] vision turned away from them?"

name: Saheeh International
text: Indeed, that is truth - the quarreling of the people of the Fire.

name: Saheeh International
text: Say, [O Muhammad], "I am only a warner, and there is not any deity except Allah, the One, the Prevailing.

name: Saheeh International
text: Lord of the heavens and the earth and whatever is between them, the Exalted in Might, the Perpetual Forgiver."

name: Saheeh International
text: Say, "It is great news

name: Saheeh International
text: From which you turn away.

name: Saheeh International
text: I had no knowledge of the exalted assembly [of angels] when they were disputing [the creation of Adam].

name: Saheeh International
text: It has not been revealed to me except that I am a clear warner."

name: Saheeh International
text: [So mention] when your Lord said to the angels, "Indeed, I am going to create a human being from clay.

name: Saheeh International
text: So when I have proportioned him and breathed into him of My [created] soul, then fall down to him in prostration."

name: Saheeh International
text: So the angels prostrated - all of them entirely.

name: Saheeh International
text: Except Iblees; he was arrogant and became among the disbelievers.

name: Saheeh International
text: [Allah] said, "O Iblees, what prevented you from prostrating to that which I created with My hands? Were you arrogant [then], or were you [already] among the haughty?"

name: Saheeh International
text: He said, "I am better than him. You created me from fire and created him from clay."

name: Saheeh International
text: [Allah] said, "Then get out of Paradise, for indeed, you are expelled.

name: Saheeh International
text: And indeed, upon you is My curse until the Day of Recompense."

name: Saheeh International
text: He said, "My Lord, then reprieve me until the Day they are resurrected."

name: Saheeh International
text: [Allah] said, "So indeed, you are of those reprieved

name: Saheeh International
text: Until the Day of the time well-known."

name: Saheeh International
text: [Iblees] said, "By your might, I will surely mislead them all

name: Saheeh International
text: Except, among them, Your chosen servants."

name: Saheeh International
text: [Allah] said, "The truth [is My oath], and the truth I say -

name: Saheeh International
text: [That] I will surely fill Hell with you and those of them that follow you all together."

name: Saheeh International
text: Say, [O Muhammad], "I do not ask you for the Qur'an any payment, and I am not of the pretentious

name: Saheeh International
text: It is but a reminder to the worlds.

name: Saheeh International
text: And you will surely know [the truth of] its information after a time."
